text:
Sleeper | SF Bay Area | Onsite | Mobile Engineer | Full-time | $110K-$150K + equity | https://sleeper.app/jobs

Sleeper is looking for mobile engineers to join us on our mission to connect people over sports. Our fantasy leagues are used by families, friends, and co-workers to compete and stay in touch with each other.

The main requirement for this role is that you have the ability to bend user interfaces to your will + make complex interactions feel natural to the end user.

Technologies we use include react, react native, and graphql, although prior experience with this stack is not required. Bonus for experience in Obj-C, Swift, or Java.

If you are interested, please email weixi@sleeper.app and send a link to something you worked on that you are proud of.
